Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/Chicago
ShortDescription: 8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, Milwaukee, Chicago and Halsted, due to street blockage near Halsted/Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, Milwaukee, Chicago and Halsted, due to street blockage near Halsted/Chicago.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #65 Grand Temporary Reroute near Halsted/Chicago
ShortDescription: 65 Grand buses temp. rerouted EB: Grand, Green, Milwaukee, Ogden, and Chicago; WB: Chicago, Ogden, Milwaukee, and Halsted, due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Halsted/Chicago, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via Grand, Green, Milwaukee, Ogden, and Chicago.

Westbound buses will operate via Chicago, Ogden, Milwaukee, and Halsted.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between 54th/Cermak and 18th
ShortDescription: Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between 54th/Cermak and 18th due to a medical emergency on the tracks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between 54th/Cermak and Polk due to a medical emergency on the tracks.

As a result, trains are operating only between the 'Loop' and 18th at this time.

Shuttle buses are available between 18th and 54th/Cermak to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as the #21 Cermak bus route, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
